Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), cmake, clang-21, clang-tools-21, libclang-21-dev, libclang-rt-21-dev, libhsa-runtime-dev (>= 6.1.2~), libnuma-dev, lld-21, liblld-21-dev, llvm-21-dev, libzstd-dev, zlib1g-dev, libxml2-dev, chrpath
Package-List: hipcc deb devel optional arch=amd64,arm64,ppc64el,riscv64 libamd-comgr-dev deb libdevel optional arch=amd64,arm64,ppc64el,riscv64 libamd-comgr3 deb libs optional arch=amd64,arm64,ppc64el,riscv64 rocm-device-libs-21 deb libs optional arch=any
Testsuite-Triggers: cmake, g++, gcc, libamdhip64-dev, make, rocminfo
Uploaders: Xuanteng Huang <xuanteng.huang@outlook.com>, Christian Kastner <ckk@debian.org>, Cordell Bloor <cgmb@debian.org>
